channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek Hangout – Episode 21 – Hanging with Michelle Fernandez, Corona SDK Book Author

item.title: By: Mo
item.dc:creator: Mo
item.description:
Great video! Love the story about the publisher just emailing you and asking if you would like to write a book! By the way the book is great. Just the stuff about setting up iTunes is worth the book price! I bought the book when it came out (ebook) i was wondering if there is any updates or if you planning on some new version? A lot of thing happened with a corona and would a more advance version or at leat an update.
Thanks for a great book. Everything I need to refresh my memory, I open your book on iBook!
Mo
item.content:encoded:
Great video! Love the story about the publisher just emailing you and asking if you would like to write a book! By the way the book is great. Just the stuff about setting up iTunes is worth the book price! I bought the book when it came out (ebook) i was wondering if there is any updates or if you planning on some new version? A lot of thing happened with a corona and would a more advance version or at leat an update.

Thanks for a great book. Everything I need to refresh my memory, I open your book on iBook!

Mo

item.title: By: Brian Burton
item.dc:creator: Brian Burton
item.description: Karim, In my opinion, if you are new to Corona & Lua, start with "Mobile App Development with Corona", it covers the fundamentals of programming with Corona. After about chapter 7 or 8, you should be ready for Michelle's book.
item.content:encoded:
Karim,
In my opinion, if you are new to Corona & Lua, start with “Mobile App Development with Corona”, it covers the fundamentals of programming with Corona. After about chapter 7 or 8, you should be ready for Michelle’s book.

item.title: By: Karim Abdelwahab
item.dc:creator: Karim Abdelwahab
item.description: i've never used corona or la before, would your book be helpful to start with or should i start with la books then start reading yours
item.content:encoded: i’ve never used corona or la before, would your book be helpful to start with or should i start with la books then start reading yours
